title: ‘Mailman’ Sepp Kuss ‘always delivers’; Jumbo boss blasts fans after American’s Tour de France crash
content:
Kuss remains 6th after escaping serious injury when fan taking a picture causes crash; Vingegaard holds yellow.

Read the full article at ‘Mailman’ Sepp Kuss ‘always delivers’; Jumbo boss blasts fans after American’s Tour de France crash on Velo.
author: sadhbhoshea
